content:
Thanks for creating this channel! Iâ€™m thrilled about ItaLean.

I wouldn't mind getting started with booking accommodation, and would like to know the location of the event, if possible.

The venue will be Via Filippo Re, 10, Bologna.

https://maps.app.goo.gl/r2di6tFcEotNzs297

Hi everyone, a quick update regarding the venue.

For technical reasons, the conference location has been changed from Via Filippo Re 10 to Via Riva di Reno 55. The new venue is within walking distance of the original one and remains in the city centre of Bologna.

We have already updated the Venue section on the website.

We apologise for any inconvenience this change may cause and thank you for your understanding.
Is there wifi at the conference venue?
The WiFi is veritatis_ospiti, the password is 492191
